text: John Hood (fl. 1421–1429), of Leominster, Herefordshire, was an English politician. He may have been the son of John Hood, MP for Leominster in 1393–1399. He was a Member (MP) of the Parliament of England for Leominster in May 1421 and 1429. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:15th-century births Category:1429 deaths Category:English MPs May 1421 Category:People from Leominster Category:English MPs 1429
title: John Hood (15th-century MP)
